34 class BinaryArchive : protected std::fstream
35 {
36 
37 public:
38  static const int HEADER_SIZE = 1024;
39  static const int VERSION_UNDEFINED = - std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
40 
41  static const std::string EXTENSION_DEFAULT;
42 
43  static std::string generatePath(const std::string &name, int block = -1);
44  static std::string generatePath(const std::string &name, const std::string &extension, int block = -1);
45 
46  using std::fstream::close;
47 
48  BinaryArchive();
49  ~BinaryArchive();
50 
51  int getVersion() const;
52  std::string getHeader() const;
53  std::string getPath() const;
54

56  int m_version;
57  std::string m_header;

59

61  ios_base::openmode mode, int block = -1);

63 };
